participant_1.background:
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
i love soccer.
i also like ice cream.
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
I have a stuffed animal in my son's nursery.

participant_2.background:
I spend time in nature to make myself feel younger.
i am fluent in spanish.
I'm a mom of four who wants to do my best to protect my kids.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
I love my husband's cooking, but I'm a sucker for a good piece of chocolate.

content.text: Hi, what's your name?
Hello, my name is [name].
Nice to meet you, [name]! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time in nature, playing piano, and learning new things.
That sounds great! I also enjoy spending time in nature and playing the piano.
Oh, that's awesome! Do you have any favorite places to go in nature?
I love going to the beach. I also enjoy hiking and camping.
I love the beach too! I have always wanted to go camping but I've never been.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What other things do you enjoy doing?
I also love learning new things. I'm always reading books and taking online courses.
That's great! I love learning new things too. I'm currently learning Spanish.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm fluent in Spanish.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm really impressed.
Thanks! It's been a long time since I learned it, but I still remember a lot.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be able to pick it back up easily.
I hope so!
I'm sure you will! You seem like a very smart person.
Thank you! That's very kind of you to say.
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you, [name].
You too! I hope we can talk again sometime.
I'd love that
